TopicTitle: Is the Making History download on kerbalspaceprogram.com bugged?

Articles.Content: It keeps on giving me a version that won't work with 1.11.2, which I need to use the Sokol suits in benjee10's suit mod.

Is it the first one you’ve downloaded (as opposed to upgrading from a previous version?) If not, maybe there was something left over from the older version. I’m sure you’ve checked but is there no way of specifying which version you want to download on the site?
